reviewText: It is"ok" video! their principal is base on military training those guys have in Israel! how efficient! different story!
Can't bring myself agree with their "no round in the chamber" philosophy.  There work is stiff and tense.  Clearing work was ok.

World Class Instructor and a well produced DVD!
I enjoyed it and picked up some very good weapons and tactics tips!

Highly recommended!
Great combination of the two DVDs. Good for firearms instructors.  They Fit well together.
Strongly recommend this DVD for training purposes of law enforcement and even civilian use. Its a MUST HAVE!!!! for instructing purposes !
